comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when use ReportEngine genReport.bat to run an old report with stock chart.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070118-0957
runtime package

Steps to reproduce:
1. Use ReportEngine genReport.bat to run the attached design file.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out and the label position is set to the new default value.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out and the label can not be shown.

Error log:
org.eclipse.birt.chart.render.Stock renderDataPointLabel
?x??: Exception
org.eclipse.birt.chart.exception.ChartException: Data point label position Outsi
de is not supported when rendering on a stock series. Allowed values are ABOVE,
BELOW, LEFT and RIGHT.
        at org.eclipse.birt.chart.render.Stock.renderDataPointLabel(Stock.java:7
09)
        at org.eclipse.birt.chart.render.Stock.renderSeries(Stock.java:435)
        at org.eclipse.birt.chart.render.AxesRenderer.renderPlot(AxesRenderer.ja
va:2220)

90)
        at org.eclipse.birt.chart.factory.Generator.render(Generator.java:1231)
        at org.eclipse.birt.chart.reportitem.ChartReportItemPresentationImpl.onR
owSets(ChartReportItemPresentationImpl.java:477)

rocessExtendedContent(LocalizedContentVisitor.java:665)

isitForeign(LocalizedContentVisitor.java:370)

eignContent.java:59)

ocalize(LocalizedContentVisitor.java:100)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.internal.executor.l18n.LocalizedReport
ItemExecutor.execute(LocalizedReportItemExecutor.java:38)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLBlockStackingLM.layout
Children(HTMLBlockStackingLM.java:63)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLAbstractLM.layout(HTML
AbstractLM.java:171)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLInlineStackingLM.resum
eLayout(HTMLInlineStackingLM.java:94)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLInlineStackingLM.layou
tChildren(HTMLInlineStackingLM.java:138)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLAbstractLM.layout(HTML

        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLRowLM.layout(HTMLRowLM
.java:33)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLBlockStackingLM.layout
Children(HTMLBlockStackingLM.java:68)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLTableLM.layoutChildren

        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.layout.html.HTMLReportLayoutEngine.lay
out(HTMLReportLayoutEngine.java:80)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.doRun(RunAnd
RenderTask.java:225)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask.run(RunAndRe
nderTask.java:147)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.runAndRenderReport(Re
portRunner.java:237)

java:162)
        at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.main(ReportRunner.jav
a:118)
outside should be supported like before.

The error log is caused by obsolete label position by previous model change. Chart builder does correct the compatible issue, but runtime environment didn't fix it.
In this fix, stock renderer will display outside/inside as default position: above, so runtime environment  can work too.

traces.message: Data point label position Outsi de is not supported when rendering on a stock series. Allowed values are ABOVE, BELOW, LEFT and RIGHT.
